title: What are the most common Business Processes that exist across all corporations? - Quora

response.answer_text: First, you should understand the 3 types of processes:   Primary or Essential process Considered to be the most important processes.There is direct contact with customers.Providing value to customers directly.Reaching or exceeding the standards of the company.Always considering the entire value chain.Support process Formally established.Supports the primary processes.No contact with customers.Doesn’t provide value to customers directly.Management process Formally Established.Coordinates the activities of the primary and support processes.Seeks business efficacy and efficiency.Measures, monitors and controls.Doesn’t provide value to customers directly.As a rule, essential processes depend on the operation, services and products. They are very specific and very important for the strategic plan. On the other hand, processes for Support and Management are very standardized.  See more about templates of processes: HEFLO Process Library: the best way to start your BPM project  Read more about Types of Processes: The Definitions of the 3 Types of Business Processes
